38#ifndef _MSGIO_H_
39#define _MSGIO_H_
40
41struct cmsgcred;
42struct iovec;
43struct msghdr;
44
45int cred_send(int sock);
46int cred_recv(int sock, struct cmsgcred *cred);
47
48int fd_send(int sock, const int *fds, size_t nfds);
49int fd_recv(int sock, int *fds, size_t nfds);
50
51int buf_send(int sock, void *buf, size_t size);
52int buf_recv(int sock, void *buf, size_t size);
53
54#endif /* !_MSGIO_H_ */
55
